thread.title: Arsenal: MTN announces partnership with Premier League giants
thread.title_full: Arsenal: MTN announces partnership with Premier League giants

author: Steve Dede
title: Arsenal: MTN announces partnership with Premier League giants
text: Tweet MTN on Saturday, February, 4 announced its partnership with Premier League giants, Arsenal . Although launched in 5 locations (Lagos, Ibadan, Kano, Portharcourt and Asaba) simultaneously, football lovers across the cities were able to connect via simulcast and live streaming. According to statement from Arsenal and MTN during the press conference, the partnership will offer exciting football contents to Arsenal fans and football lovers across Nigeria. play Kanu Nwankwo (second from left) Celestine (far right) (DKK Nigeria) Football fans will also get an opportunity to visit Emirates on all-expense paid trips while thereâ€™ll be opportunity for local talent development through coaching clinics. play MTN announces partnership with Arsenal (DKK Nigeria) The launch events at IMAX studios featured a cocktail, photo ops and networking among guests. play MTN announces partnership with Arsenal (DKK Nigeria) Many football personalities also graced the occasion. Arsenal legend, Kanu Nwankwo , former Chelsea star, Celestine Babayaro and ex Eagles captain, Austin Okocha registered memorable presence. play Vector (DKK Nigeria) Football pundits such as Deji Omotoyinbo, Charles Anazodo of Supersports , Temisan Okomi , Ken Ochonogor and Mike Miyaki were also in attendance. play MTN announces partnership with Arsenal (DKK Nigeria) play MTN announces partnership with Arsenal (DKK Nigeria) Other dignitaries that attended the event include Lagos socialite, Prince Gabby Yadua , MD of Beat FM, Chris Ubosi ; rapper, Vector tha Viper , CEO, Nigerian Stock Exchange, Oscar Onyeama ; MD, Metropolitan Motors, Olutoyin Okeowo; Directors of MTN Nigeria, Tunde Folawiyo and Gbenga Oyebode ; Chairman of MTN Nigeria, Paschal Dozie.
